changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.product_unit_access_authorization AS SELECT a.id, p.name AS product, ptr.name AS product_relationship, r.name AS relationship, l.name AS unit, ctr.name AS unit_relationship FROM access_authorization a JOIN product p ON a.product1 = p.id JOIN relationship ptr ON a.parent_transitive_relationship = ptr.id JOIN relationship r ON a.relationship = r.id JOIN unit l ON a.unit2 = l.id JOIN relationship ctr ON a.child_transitive_relationship = ctr.id WHERE a.authorization_type = '9';
ALTER TABLE readable.product_unit_access_authorization OWNER TO core;
